featured.text: The Fourth of July means beer and New Year's Eve is an entire night dedicated to the proposition that everyone must get 25 .
Beer companies often sponsor the sports events young people watch.

definition.zh_def: 一種由水、麥芽、啤酒花和酵母釀製的酒精飲料。
definition.en_def: An alcoholic beverage made from water, malt, hops, and yeast.
definition.example: I enjoy having a cold beer after work.
